
## Class : mucosa of gallbladder

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0005033
 * *Label* = mucosa of gallbladder
 * *Definition* = A mucosa that is part of a gallbladder [Automatically generated definition].
